mapper.sql: id, order_no, trade_no, out_type, status, created_by, created_by_name, created, updated_by, updated_by_name, updated
mapper.insert: insert into pay_finance_account_detail (id, order_no, trade_no, out_type, status, created_by, created_by_name, created, updated_by, updated_by_name, updated) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updatedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update pay_finance_account_detail
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
trade_no = #{tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
out_type = #{outType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
created_by_name = #{createdByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
updated_by_name = #{updatedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update pay_finance_account_detail set order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, trade_no = #{tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, out_type = #{outType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_by_name = #{createdByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, updated_by_name = #{updatedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT SUM(pw.total_fee) AS realFee, SUM(pw.callback_cmms_amt) AS cmmsAmt FROM pay_finance_account_detail pfad LEFT JOIN pay_withdrawals pw ON pw.withdrawals_no = pfad.order_no WHERE 1 = 1 AND pfad.`status` = 1 AND pfad.out_type = 1
AND to_days(pw.time_end) = to_days(now())

SELECT SUM(pr.refund_amount) AS refundAmout FROM pay_finance_account_detail pfad LEFT JOIN pay_refund pr ON pr.order_no = pfad.order_no WHERE 1 = 1 AND pfad.`status` = 1 AND pfad.out_type = 2
AND to_days(pr.created) = to_days(now())

SELECT SUM(pad.detail_money) todayAdvancesReceived FROM pay_accounting_detail pad WHERE 1 = 1
AND pad.detail_type = '1' AND pad.order_complete_status = '0' AND to_days(pad.insert_time) = to_days(now())
AND pad.detail_type = '1' AND pad.order_complete_status = '1' AND to_days(pad.insert_time) = to_days(now())
AND pad.detail_type = '1' AND to_days(pad.insert_time) = to_days(now()) AND ( pad.order_complete_status = '0' OR pad.order_complete_status = '1')
AND pad.detail_type = '1' AND ( pad.order_complete_status = '0' OR pad.order_complete_status = '1')
AND pad.detail_type = '3' AND to_days(pad.insert_time) = to_days(now()) AND ( pad.order_complete_status = '0' OR pad.order_complete_status = '1')
AND pad.detail_type = '3' AND ( pad.order_complete_status = '0' OR pad.order_complete_status = '1')
SELECT SUM( IFNULL(cmms_amt, 0) - IFNULL(callback_cmms_amt, 0) ) AS revenueMoney FROM pay_withdrawals WHERE callback_status = 1
SELECT SUM(budget_amount) AS companySupplementInMoney FROM pay_financial_bill WHERE busi_type = '扫码充值' OR busi_type = '网银充值'
